pullRequest.title: Use packages for the common RESTEasy reflection ignores and add the JSON packages to DEFAULT_IGNORED_PACKAGES
pullRequest.bodyText:
We used to add classes one at a time but in all those cases, adding the
whole package makes more sense as everything will be handled by RESTEasy
and specific (de)serializers.
I was sure I had created a PR for that branch but apparently missed it...
Fixes #11208

nodes.bodyText: This one is missing, it's on the javax.ws.rs.container package, not on javax.ws.rs.core

commit.message:
Use packages for the common RESTEasy reflection ignores

We used to add classes one at a time but in all those cases, adding the
whole package makes more sense as everything will be handled by RESTEasy
and specific (de)serializers.

nodes.bodyText: Wondering if we could provide a config item for user to build this list up by themselves? Of course we can have good defaults, but we have been adding classes/ packages on a continual basis here.
